summary: A VPN (Virtual Private Network) Service That Is Built On A Decentralized Architecture. - Privago VPNs support digital assets including crypto coins, NFTs, and DeFi assets. For advanced crypto traders or beginners exploring Web3, using VPNs for crypto adds a crucial security layer. Since VPNs encrypt all traffic sent through their networks, it becomes much more difficult for malicious actors to hack into a crypto wallet and steal the assets inside.
